summary:
brought to you by YoloSweg420BlazetTwerkPartyBloackSquad... comes an epic overhaul worthy of all Mt dew fans.
(adds Mt Dew logo on all ale bottles)
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][font=Trebuchet MS][i][color=#38761d][img]http://sd.keepcalm-o-matic.co.uk/i/stay-wired-drink-mountain-dew.png[/img]
Mt [/color][color=#980000]Dew[/color][/i][/font][color=#980000] [/color][/size]
[u][color=#980000]Gamers [/color][color=#38761d]only [/color][/u][/center]


[center][size=2] [font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Have you ever wanted to get really dank in Skyrim while playing Skyrim?  Well my new addition to the "Dank Skyrim" series now includes "Dank Mt Dew"[/font][/size][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]This mod is meant to be played with [/font][color=#ffff00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59356/?][size=6]MLG Audio Overhaul (By me of course)[/size][/url] [/color][color=#f4f4f4],[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]get it or die[/font][/color]

[b][i][size=5]F.A.Q[/size][/i][/b]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#38761d][size=4][b]What does this mod do?[/b]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]- This mod adds Mt Dew bottles.
 
- My other file adds a new drink called Mt dew
that grants you the power of the gamer

-I plan on adding more different types of Mt Dew with different effects
[/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][i][size=5][b]Includes[/b][/size][/i]
-Mt Dew 
-Mt Dew (Pure Mt Dew)
-Mt Dew can be found in the[size=4] Silver-Blood treasury house Vault[/size][size=5] [/size]

Right now that's it, but i plan on making Skyrim a danker place 

[/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5][b][i]Disclaimers [/i][/b][/size][/font]
-I don not own Mt Dew tm/ I am to poor to own Mt Dew tm
author: Darnell Nugget
